newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Telebras jumps on telecoms law, forecasts.
newsitem.headline: Telebras jumps on telecoms law, forecasts.

text.p: Telebras jumped midday in Sao Paulo and New York on optimism over legislative progress on Brazil's new telecoms law, higher rates and rumors two banks hiked earnings forecasts for the firm, brokers said.
"There's a lot of demand. Big banks are recommending buy," one local trader said.

On the Sao Paulo bourse, Telebras' benchmark preferred was up a hefty 3.47 percent at 131.20 reais in trade of 223 million reais at 1350 local/1250 edt. Its common was 4.34 pecent higher at 122.50 reais on volume of 24 million reais.
Telebras' ADR was up a strong 4 1/4 at 123 1/8 in New York.
